definition: clever-clever/clever in trivial matters/sharp but petty-minded
a clever person may become the victim of his own ingenuity (idiom); cleverness may overreach itself/too smart for one's own good
pinyin: cong1 ming2 fan3 bei4 cong1 ming2 wu4

definition: a clever person may become the victim of his own ingenuity (idiom); cleverness may overreach itself/too smart for one's own good
pinyin: cong1 ming2 fan3 bei4 cong1 ming2 wu4

definition: sharp ears and keen eyes (idiom)/keen and alert/perceptive

sentences.english: The doctor is highly competent, many patients recover their lost hearing after receiving treatment.
sentences.chinese: 這位醫生妙手回春，不少耳聾的人經治療復聰了。

sentences.english: Objective Establish a method for the quality control of Fucong mixture.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立復聰合劑的質量控制方法。

sentences.english: It's ridiculous you're way too smart not to be here.
sentences.chinese: 你不在這裏是在太甚聰了然，這真是荒誕乖張。

sentences.english: Objective To assess the efficacy of Naofucong capsule for vascular dementia (VD).
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察自擬腦復聰膠囊治療血管性癡呆的療效。

sentences.english: Allow me to introduce myself. I am Satoshi Ishikawa, president of Kyodo News from Japan.
sentences.chinese: 我是日本共同通訊社社長石川聰。

sentences.english: They strained to see the boat far away from them.
sentences.chinese: 他們聰起腳盡力想要看到遠處那隻船。

definition: to gallop/to assist/to attack/to wade/great/old variant of 憑|凭[ping2]
surname Wu/area comprising southern Jiangsu, northern Zhejiang and Shanghai/name of states in Southern China at different historical periods
Zheng state during the Warring States period/surname Zheng/abbr. for 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation
dawn/daybreak/to know/to let sb know/to make explicit
surname Zou/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1046-256 BC) in the southeast of Shandong Province
